projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Having the Axway clang-format files is nice to check the modules syntax and adjust it to the same coding style. 

This PR will add it to the default iOS/Android module template so it can be used in all modules right away: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/10015

A linting section was added to the README
fields.summary: Add default clang-format to the Android/iOS module template
